settings.prefix: CREATE TABLE #tmp_nh_event_provider( ProviderId int, ProviderName nvarchar(255), ProviderClassName nvarchar(255), AssemblyName nvarchar(260), SystemName nvarchar(255), StartTime datetime, Interval int, Timeout int, ActivationState tinyint ) INSERT #tmp_nh_event_provider EXEC [SchemaPrefix].NSGetProviders 'NonHostedOnly'
